name: The Juan For You
description:
This game is a spin off for our main game Romance Resort.

Due to Juan's popularity we decided this hilarious little spin off game would be a perfect way to get more excitement for our project.

Here the player, having woken with a bad mood and not feeling good about herself, will encounter the flamboyant and over the top complimenting Juan who will do EVERYTHING to get her to feel better about herself. Even a.. serenade?
